questions.question: What is the purpose of this website?
questions.answer: This website is a platform for the community to ask questions and get answers from the community. It is a place to share knowledge and learn from each other.

questions.question: How do I ask a question?
questions.answer: To ask a question, click on the 'Ask a new question' button and fill out the form. Once you submit your question, it will be reviewed by the community and posted on the website.

questions.question: How do I answer a question?
questions.answer: To answer a question, click on the 'Answer' button below the question and fill out the form. Once you submit your answer, it will be reviewed by the community and posted on the website.
